overview: Adam is a man overtaken by PSTD from fighting in Afghanistan following the 9/11 attacks. His comrade, Mitch has noticed some unsavoury changes in his character and has been trying to help his friend. After one day when Adam has been hurting himself badly, Mitch restrains him in the basement and calls an ambulance for his aid. Wendy, Mitch’s wife and Adam’s sister are curious about all the fuss, and after going into the basement she discovers a new world, hell.
tagline: Wendy didn't step into the basement... She stepped into Hell
title: Don't Go Into the Basement
